item.title: Unit Testing
item.description: Summary Making sure software works as expected and required is a crucial part of development. Doing this manually is tedious and error prone. In this lecture, you will learn the basics of automated unit testing for python using pytest. Slides as PDF This browser does not support PDFs. Please download the PDF to view it: Download PDF. References and external https://docs.pytest.org/
